benefits.name: Ability Score Increase
effects: Increase your Strength or Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

benefits.name: Guardian
effects: Immediately after a creature within 5 feet of you takes the Disengage action or hits a target other than you with an attack, you can make an Opportunity Attack against that creature.

benefits.name: Halt
effects: When you hit a creature with an Opportunity Attack, the creature's Speed becomes 0 for the rest of the current turn.
